Class ProductCrawlerBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.config.ProductCrawlerBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoreMetKeys, SpringSetIdInjectionType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProductCrawler

    public abstract class ProductCrawlerBean
extends Object
implements SpringSetIdInjectionType, CoreMetKeys
    Turns a ProductCrawler into a Spring-configurable entity.

    bfoster (Brian Foster)
